name: GitHub - Fira Code
additional_info:
https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode/blob/master/LICENSE

You need to have Fira Code installed locally for this to work. - https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode
css:
@-moz-document domain(github.com) {
    .branch-name,
    .commit-ref,
    .commit .sha,
    .commit .sha-block,
    .commit-desc pre,
    .commit-tease-sha,
    .blob-num,
    .blob-code-inner,
    kbd,
    .credit-card .cvv,
    .credit-card .text,
    .CommunityTemplate-highlight,
    .file-info,
    .hook-delivery-guid,
    .hook-delivery-response-status,
    .news .alert .branch-link,
    .export-phrase pre,
    .oauth-app-info-container dl.keys dd,
    .two-factor-recovery-codes,
    .CodeMirror,
    .CodeMirror-dialog input,
    .cm-s-github-light .CodeMirror-lines,
    .file-editor-textarea,
    code,
    pre,
    samp,
    tt,
    .input-monospace,
    .text-mono {
        font-family: 'Fira Code',SFMono-Regular,Consolas,Liberation Mono,Menlo,Courier,monospace !important;
    }
}
